title: ASP.NET Core MVC Server Error HTTP Extensions
description: AspNetCore.Mvc.HttpActionResults.ServerError.Extensions is a collection of server error HTTP status code extension methods for ASP.NET Core MVC. See the project repository for more information and available features.
